name: Gendai Daisenryaku 2020: Yureru Sekai Chitsujo! Taikoku no Yabou to Sekai Taisen
summary: "What if a dictatorship fired a ballistic missile?" Or, "What if a major continental country occupied an island?" This is a strategy war simulation game featuring a total of 39 scenarios themed after fictional but plausible international affairs.
